EmailTemplate.name: Ford Rotunda Furniture & Interiors E-mail (August)
EmailTemplate.subject: Keeping you comfortable and productive on your road to success
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Ford Rotunda Email
888.263.3423 (888-2-OFFICE)
My Account Technology Furniture Ink & Toner Paper Office Supplies
Let’s create the workspace that works for you. As a Ford or Lincoln dealer, enjoy special pricing and exclusive discounts on a huge selection of furniture from Office Depot®. From initial concept to final installation, we’ll help you develop a furniture plan that’s right for your dealership … and your budget. Comprehensive product assortment Shop top-grade office furniture from brands you trust. We offer the most extensive selections, from traditional to transitional to contemporary. Custom-made solutions and services Have a design challenge? We offer customized options to fit your unique space requirements. We also provide the resources, know-how and vision to see your furniture project through from start to finish. Learn more about our comprehensive, full-service furniture solutions at workspaceinteriorsod.com Register for your Office Depot account at onerotunda.com or odams.officedepot.com/apps/landing/custom/ford to see our full assortment and latest pricing. Click here to start your journey. Lisa Creamer Account Manager | Office Depot, Inc. 855.337.6811 Ext. 12878 Elisabeth.Creamer@officedepot.com
